wikipedia_page.main:
Amy Turner (born 4 July 1991) is an English footballer who plays as a defender for Orlando Pride in the NWSL. She has also played for the England national team.
Turner previously played for Manchester United, Liverpool, Notts County, Sheffield, Leeds United and Doncaster Rovers Belles.

response: Having been traded to San Diego Wave FC in exchange for roster protection during the 2022 NWSL Expansion Draft on 8 December 2021, James was subsequently traded to Orlando Pride along with a league record $275,000 in Allocation Money in exchange for Alex Morgan eight days later. The move reunited her with fiancé Amy Turner, the first time since Notts County in 2016 they had been at a club at the same time.
On 23 December 2020, James announced her engagement to fellow professional footballer Amy Turner.
Amy Turner (born 31 July 1984) is an English rugby union player.
* Amy Turner (rugby, born March 1984), New Zealand-born semi-professional Australian rugby league and rugby union player
* Amy Turner (rugby union, born July 1984), English rugby union player
